reviewText: It is very useful and fun,  I recommend it.  It is fun and keeps you moving really moving.  Have fun.
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: I look all over for this for my mother inlaw. She love Richard and was happy that I found it at a great price.
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: This DVD is different .It has a stage and a band and at the end of each song, Richard prances up to the stage like a teenager to applaud the mediocre band.choreographed and without Richard's usual directions  on the exercises, it would be very difficult for one to follow up, especially someone too obese to be as agile as this dance video displays.
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: I have a lot of exercise videos but this is my favorite.  The music is upbeat and Richard is energetic and entertaining.  Plus the routine is such that I can press myself harder and get a great workout, or relax a bit on my "slower" days and still burn calories and feel like I got my exercise.
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: Considering it's an "oldie", it still gets the job done. Keeps you moving from beginning to end, upbeat and motivational.
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: Richard's tapes are a lot of fun to do once you learn them, and this is no  exception. However, I prefer a longer routine. (This is only 21 or so  minutes aerobic.) And Richard doesn't do mirror cueing on this tape. But  it's a good place to start for Beginners. Beginners be aware that there are  a lot of knee lifts that will wear you out the first few times you do this  routine. The up side to this is that you will build strength and stamina  quickly and be able to move on to his other aerobic tapes that are longer  and just as much fun (if not moreso). I'd say this tape would be too easy  for Intermediate or higher exercisers.
summary: Good tape, but not my favorite of Richard's
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS

reviewText: I bought this and other workout videos for my mother per her request and as far as I know they are collecting dust!
Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS
